_header: O glorious god redeemer of mankind
_description: A prayer prefixed in some MSS to the ‘Arms of Christ’ — three quatrains

BodDou1.First Lines:
O Glorius god redemer of mankyndewhiche on the crosse hyng full of
                    compassyon…
BodDou1.Last Lines:
…And graunt me grace so to serue the hereAffter this lyfe to
                    be in tuycion
BodDou1.Editions:
Bad Key: Brown1939: 221.
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “The ‘Arma Christi’ Rolls.” 
             Modern Language Review
         34 (1939): 415-21: 417.
